    • Method Detail

      • seedDoubleArray

        public static double[] seedDoubleArray(int features)
        This method populates the array with a Gaussian Distribution
        Parameters:
        features - : number of features in a data point

      • combineLabelAndData

        public static double[] combineLabelAndData(double[] x,
                                           double y)
        This method combines the label and features in the data point This can be use to submit a single message in the stream
        Parameters:
        x - data points with d features
        y - label
        Returns:
        [y, x_i, ...x_d]

      • generateDummyDataPoints

        public static double[][] generateDummyDataPoints(int samples,
                                                 int features)
        This method provides a dummy data set for batch based computations User can say the number of samples and feature size and this function generates a data set with labels included per data sample
        Parameters:
        samples - number of data points = N
        features - number of features in a data point = D
        Returns:
        data.length = N, data[0].length = D + 1, i.e: data[i][0]== label, data[i][1:D+1]== {x}

      • generateBinaryModel

        @Deprecated
public static BinaryBatchModel generateBinaryModel(double[][] xy,
                                                               int iterations,
                                                               double alpha)
        Deprecated. method
        This method is deprecated and use the updateModelData method to update the model with data points
        Parameters:
        xy - data points with {y_i, x_i_1, .... x_i_d}
        iterations - number of iterations
        alpha - learning rate
        Returns:
        returns the BinaryBatchModel

      • updateModelData

        public static BinaryBatchModel updateModelData(BinaryBatchModel binaryBatchModel,
                                               double[][] xy)
        This method updates an existing BinaryBatchModel with the data points
        Parameters:
        binaryBatchModel - Binary Batch Model
        xy - data points with {y_i, x_i_1, .... x_i_d}
        Returns:
        returns the updated model
